Shop now

Ash Perfect Fit (Blinds By Post)

A mid-grey shade, the Ash Grey 25mm Perfect Fit blind will give any room the modern feel, this colour oozes with class. Using a patented and extremely easy tool-less clip on system, the Perfect Fit wooden blinds are a child-safe option, and are both drill and screw free - giving peace of mind that your manufacturers warranty on your windows and doors is not affected. Hand crafted in Yorkshire, the Perfect Fit frame is made from Aluminium, with UV-treated plastic corners and, of course, the blind is made from real basswood - giving extremely good thermal benefits to any room as wood is a natural insulator. Inside the Perfect Fit frame the blind uses a colour co-ordinating grey headrail and a silver bottom bar, with a clear operating handle and control wand. Perfect Fit Ash Wood Venetian Blinds. Combine the luxury Sunwood collection of 25mm Wood Venetian with a state of the art perfect fit frame specifically designed for use with UPVC windows, bi-folds, conservatory and doors.

from £19.95
Shop now

Morena Perfect Fit (Blinds By Post)

An sumptuous beige colour, the Morena 25mm Perfect Fit blind will bring warmth into any room. Using a patented and extremely easy tool-less clip on system, the Perfect Fit wooden blinds are a child-safe option, and are both drill and screw free - giving peace of mind that your manufacturers warranty on your windows and doors is not affected. Hand crafted in Yorkshire, the Perfect Fit frame is made from Aluminium, with UV-treated plastic corners and, of course, the blind is made from real basswood - giving extremely good thermal benefits to any room as wood is a natural insulator. Inside the Perfect Fit frame the blind uses a colour co-ordinating beige brown headrail and a white bottom bar, with a clear operating handle and control wand. Perfect Fit Morena Wood Venetian Blinds. Combine the luxury Sunwood collection of 25mm Wood Venetian with a state of the art perfect fit frame specifically designed for use with UPVC windows, bi-folds, conservatory and doors.

from £19.95

Meadow Flower asc Spring Perfect Fit (Blinds By Post)

Part of our Meadow Flower range, where Advanced Solar Control (asc) creates a perfect solution for any room, reducing the sun's glare whilst also increasing your energy efficiency. The ‘ASC’ refers to a reflective backing on the material which helps improve the energy efficiency of the blind by reflecting the heat out in the Summer and retaining heat in the Winter. The metallic reflective backing is therefore on the reverse of the fabric, facing towards the window.  This perfect fit blind is produced in a single cell fabric and can be mounted in a 'no drill, no screws' fitting to most double glazed, internally beaded, UPVC windows and doors.  This is a single-cell fabric, the guide wires will be exposed meaning that there will be visible holes allowing light to come through. These can be seen on our range of images above.  If you would prefer the wires to be hidden, please take a look at our 'Hive' or 'Luna' ranges.  Made to measure Meadow Flower asc Spring Perfect Fit Pleated Blind PX80012. An elegant, dim-out pleated blind produced with an asc, solar reflective, backing.

from £20.75
Shop now

The ‘ASC’ refers to a reflective backing on the material which helps improve the energy efficiency of the blind by reflecting the heat out in the Summer and retaining heat in the Winter. Infusion asc Stone Grey Perfect Fit (Blinds By Post)

Infusion ASC Stone Grey Perfect Fit Pleated Blind. Part of our Infusion asc range, where Advanced Solar Control (asc) creates a perfect solution for any room, reducing the sun's glare whilst also increasing your energy efficiency. The ‘ASC’ refers to a reflective backing on the material which helps improve the energy efficiency of the blind by reflecting the heat out in the Summer and retaining heat in the Winter. The metallic reflective backing is therefore on the reverse of the fabric, facing towards the window.  This fabric will still allow light into the room, but giving full privacy when inside from outside. This perfect fit blind is produced in a single cell fabric and can be mounted in a 'no drill, no screws' fitting to most double glazed, internally beaded, uPVC windows and doors. The blind is fixed by brackets which sit between the black rubber bead and the glass, they simply slide in when installing - taking minutes per blind to fit and keeping the window guarantee!  This is a single-cell fabric, the guide wires will be exposed meaning that there will be visible holes allowing light to come through. These can be seen on our range of images above.  If you would prefer the wires to be hidden, please take a look at our 'Hive' or 'Luna' ranges.  Made to measure Infusion ASC Stone Grey Perfect Fit Pleated Blind PX4137. Our Infusion range allows in natural light but has the added benefit of having an advanced solar coating which improves energy efficiency

from £20.38
grey grey-perfect-fit perfect-fit
Shop now

Please note, on a perfect fit blind you may get light leakage between the material and frame. Made to measure Hive Silkweave Blackout Ash Grey Perfect Fit Pleated Blind, PX78504. A contemporary blackout blind produced in a honeycomb pleated fabric.

Pure Perfect Fit Anthracite Frame (Blinds By Post)

A brilliant white shade, the Pure White 25mm Perfect Fit blind will give any room that modern look, and sit well against any Anthracite uPVC window or door.  Using a patented and extremely easy tool-less clip on system, the Perfect Fit wooden blinds are a child-safe option, and are both drill and screw free - giving peace of mind that your manufacturers warranty on your windows and doors is not affected. Hand crafted in Yorkshire, the Perfect Fit frame is made from Aluminium, with UV-treated plastic corners and, of course, the blind is made from real basswood - giving extremely good thermal benefits to any room as wood is a natural insulator. Inside the Perfect Fit frame the blind uses a colour co-ordinating white headrail and a colour co-ordinating white bottom bar. Perfect Fit Pure Wood Venetian Blinds. Combine the luxury Sunwood collection of 25mm Wood Venetian with a state of the art perfect fit frame specifically designed for use with UPVC windows, bi-folds, conservatory and doors.

Infusion asc Ecru Perfect Fit (Blinds By Post)

Infusion asc Ecru Perfect Fit Pleated Blind. Part of our Infusion asc range, where Advanced Solar Control (asc) creates a perfect solution for any room, reducing the sun's glare whilst also increasing your energy efficiency. The ‘ASC’ refers to a reflective backing on the material which helps improve the energy efficiency of the blind by reflecting the heat out in the Summer and retaining heat in the Winter. The metallic reflective backing is therefore on the reverse of the fabric, facing towards the window.  This fabric will still allow light into the room, but giving full privacy when inside from outside. This perfect fit blind is produced in a single cell fabric and can be mounted in a 'no drill, no screws' fitting to most double glazed, internally beaded, UPVC windows and doors.  This is a single-cell fabric, the guide wires will be exposed meaning that there will be visible holes allowing light to come through. These can be seen on our range of images above.  If you would prefer the wires to be hidden, please take a look at our 'Hive' or 'Luna' ranges.  Made to measure Infusion ASC Ecru Perfect Fit Pleated Blind PX4146. Our Infusion range allows in natural light but has the added benefit of having an advanced solar coating which improves energy efficiency

from £20.38
Shop now

Infusion asc Raspberry Perfect Fit (Blinds By Post)

Infusion asc Raspberry Perfect Fit Pleated Blind. Part of our Infusion asc range, where Advanced Solar Control (asc) creates a perfect solution for any room, reducing the sun's glare whilst also increasing your energy efficiency. The ‘ASC’ refers to a reflective backing on the material which helps improve the energy efficiency of the blind by reflecting the heat out in the Summer and retaining heat in the Winter. The metallic reflective backing is therefore on the reverse of the fabric, facing towards the window.  This fabric will still allow light into the room, but giving full privacy when inside from outside. This perfect fit blind is produced in a single cell fabric and can be mounted in a 'no drill, no screws' fitting to most double glazed, internally beaded, uPVC windows and doors. The blind is fixed by brackets which sit between the black rubber bead and the glass, they simply slide in when installing - taking minutes per blind to fit and keeping the window guarantee!  This is a single-cell fabric, the guide wires will be exposed meaning that there will be visible holes allowing light to come through. The ‘ASC’ refers to a reflective backing on the material which helps improve the energy efficiency of the blind by reflecting the heat out in the Summer and retaining heat in the Winter. Blackout fabric: Yes. Please note, on a perfect fit blind you may get light leakage between the material and frame. Made to measure Hive Blackout Green Perfect Fit Pleated Blind PX72013. A contemporary blackout blind produced in a honeycomb pleated fabric providing thermal and increasing energy efficiency.

from £24.00
green green-perfect-fit perfect-fit

Shop now

Infusion asc Cream Perfect Fit (Blinds By Post)

Infusion asc Cream Perfect Fit Pleated Blind. Part of our Infusion asc range, where Advanced Solar Control (asc) creates a perfect solution for any room, reducing the sun's glare whilst also increasing your energy efficiency. The ‘ASC’ refers to a reflective backing on the material which helps improve the energy efficiency of the blind by reflecting the heat out in the Summer and retaining heat in the Winter. The metallic reflective backing is therefore on the reverse of the fabric, facing towards the window.  This fabric will still allow light into the room, but giving full privacy when inside from outside. This perfect fit blind is produced in a single cell fabric and can be mounted in a 'no drill, no screws' fitting to most double glazed, internally beaded, uPVC windows and doors. The blind is fixed by brackets which sit between the black rubber bead and the glass, they simply slide in when installing - taking minutes per blind to fit and keeping the window guarantee!  This is a single-cell fabric, the guide wires will be exposed meaning that there will be visible holes allowing light to come through. These can be seen on our range of images above.  If you would prefer the wires to be hidden, please take a look at our 'Hive' or 'Luna' ranges.  Made to measure Infusion ASC Cream Perfect Fit Pleated Blind PX4102. Our Infusion range allows in natural light but has the added benefit of having an advanced solar coating which improves energy efficiency

from £20.38
cream cream-perfect-fit perfect-fit
Shop now

Hazel Perfect Fit (Blinds By Post)

A dark brown shade, the Hazel 25mm Perfect Fit blind will be the final part of your interior jigsaw. Using a patented and extremely easy tool-less clip on system, the Perfect Fit wooden blinds are a child-safe option, and are both drill and screw free - giving peace of mind that your manufacturers warranty on your windows and doors is not affected. Hand crafted in Yorkshire, the Perfect Fit frame is made from Aluminium, with UV-treated plastic corners and, of course, the blind is made from real basswood - giving extremely good thermal benefits to any room as wood is a natural insulator. Inside the Perfect Fit frame the blind uses a colour co-ordinating brown headrail and a brown bottom bar, with a clear operating handle and control wand. Perfect Fit Hazel Wood Venetian Blinds. Combine the luxury Sunwood collection of 25mm Wood Venetian with a state of the art perfect fit frame specifically designed for use with UPVC windows, bi-folds, conservatory and doors.

from £19.95

This perfect fit blind is produced in a single cell fabric and can be mounted in a 'no drill, no screws' fitting to most double glazed, internally beaded, uPVC windows and doors. The blind is fixed by brackets which sit between the black rubber bead and the glass, they simply slide in when installing - taking minutes per blind to fit and keeping the window guarantee!  This is a single-cell fabric, the guide wires will be exposed meaning that there will be visible holes allowing light to come through. These can be seen on our range of images above.  If you would prefer the wires to be hidden, please take a look at our 'Hive' or 'Luna' ranges.  Made to measure Infusion ASC Azure Perfect Fit Pleated Blind PX4118. Our Infusion range allows in natural light but has the added benefit of having an advanced solar coating which improves energy efficiency

from £20.38

Infusion asc Ochre Perfect Fit (Blinds By Post)

Infusion asc Ochre Perfect Fit Pleated Blind. Part of our Infusion asc range, where Advanced Solar Control (asc) creates a perfect solution for any room, reducing the sun's glare whilst also increasing your energy efficiency. The ‘ASC’ refers to a reflective backing on the material which helps improve the energy efficiency of the blind by reflecting the heat out in the Summer and retaining heat in the Winter. The metallic reflective backing is therefore on the reverse of the fabric, facing towards the window.  This fabric will still allow light into the room, but giving full privacy when inside from outside. This perfect fit blind is produced in a single cell fabric and can be mounted in a 'no drill, no screws' fitting to most double glazed, internally beaded, uPVC windows and doors. The blind is fixed by brackets which sit between the black rubber bead and the glass, they simply slide in when installing - taking minutes per blind to fit and keeping the window guarantee!  This is a single-cell fabric, the guide wires will be exposed meaning that there will be visible holes allowing light to come through. These can be seen on our range of images above.  If you would prefer the wires to be hidden, please take a look at our 'Hive' or 'Luna' ranges.  Made to measure Infusion ASC Ochre Perfect Fit Pleated Blind PX4140. Our Infusion range allows in natural light but has the added benefit of having an advanced solar coating which improves energy efficiency

Infusion asc Calico Perfect Fit Pleated Blind. Part of our Infusion asc range, where Advanced Solar Control (asc) creates a perfect solution for any room, reducing the sun's glare whilst also increasing your energy efficiency. The ‘ASC’ refers to a reflective backing on the material which helps improve the energy efficiency of the blind by reflecting the heat out in the Summer and retaining heat in the Winter. The metallic reflective backing is therefore on the reverse of the fabric, facing towards the window.  This fabric will still allow light into the room, but giving full privacy when inside from outside. This perfect fit blind is produced in a single cell fabric and can be mounted in a 'no drill, no screws' fitting to most double glazed, internally beaded, uPVC windows and doors. Hive Lusso Stone Perfect Fit Pleated Blind. Part of our Hive privacy non-Blackout range, this perfect fit blind is produced in a honeycomb fabric and can be mounted in a 'no drill, no screws' fitting to most double glazed, internally beaded, UPVC windows and doors. The Hive Lusso range has a  backing. Honeycomb fabric: no visible holes or cords punched through the face or back of the fabric.  Made to measure Hive Lusso Ice White Perfect Fit Pleated Blind PX71001. A luxurious dim-out blind, produced in a honeycomb pleated fabric.
